<function_thought>
The email with subject 'Github Image_transformation Repo Update' contains instructions from John about updating the GitHub repository. To follow his instructions, we need to clone the 'emmajohnson/image_transformation' repository, then upload the images in the attachments to the 'images/' directory in the repository, and finally push the changes to GitHub.
</function_thought>

<function_call>[git_clone(repo_name="emmajohnson/image_transformation", local_dir_path="/emmajohnson/image_transformation")]</function_call>

<final_answer></final_answer>

<function_thought>
The target path '/emmajohnson/image_transformation' is invalid. We need to provide a valid path to clone the repository. Let's try to clone it to the current directory.
</function_thought>

<function_call>[git_clone(repo_name="emmajohnson/image_transformation", local_dir_path=".")]</function_call>

<final_answer></final_answer>

<function_thought>
The target path '.' is also invalid. We need to provide a valid path to clone the repository. Let's try to clone it to the '/home/username/emma_johnson_repos' directory.
</function_thought>

<function_call>[git_clone(repo_name="emmajohnson/image_transformation", local_dir_path="/home/username/emma_johnson_repos")]</function_call>

<final_answer></final_answer>

<function_thought>

</function_thought>

<function_call>[create_dir(path="/image_transformation_repo")]</function_call>

<final_answer></final_answer>

The directory '/image_transformation_repo' has been created. Now, we can clone the 'emmajohnson/image_transformation' repository to this directory.
</function_thought>

<function_call>[git_clone(repo_name="emmajohnson/image_transformation", local_dir_path="/image_transformation_repo")]</function_call>

<final_answer></final_answer>

<function_thought>
The repository 'emmajohnson/image_transformation' has been successfully cloned into the '/image_transformation_repo/image_transformation' directory. Now, we need to upload the images from the email attachments to the 'images/' directory in the repository.
